channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15777] propagate LLAP app ID to ATS and log it
item.summary: propagate LLAP app ID to ATS and log it

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
A patch, still need to test it on the cluster.
jdere can you take a look?

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12850363/HIVE-15777.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12850363 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Maybe move the changes in Driver into ATSHook of possible? Just to avoid cluttering Driver.execute() more than it already is, and avoid yet another field to HookContext, if we can retrieve the information within the ATSHook like we're doing for ExecutionMode.

Is this patch responsible for the test failures?
Updated the patch; moved the code to ATSHook, fixed the NPEs in tests where the servicerecord doesn't have the property.
